apiVersion: karpenter.sh/v1
kind: NodePool
metadata:
    name: default
spec:
    template:
        spec:
            nodeClassRef:
                group: karpenter.k8s.aws
                kind: EC2NodeClass
                name: default
---
apiVersion: karpenter.k8s.aws/v1
kind: EC2NodeClass
metadata:
    name: default
spec:
    amiSelectorTerms:
        - id: ami-09ea311630482acd7
    role: karpenter-node-my-eks-cluster
    securityGroupSelectorTerms:
        - tags:
              karpenter.sh/discovery: my-eks-cluster
    subnetSelectorTerms:
        - tags:
              karpenter.sh/discovery: my-eks-cluster
    tags:
        managed-by: karpenter
